have to agree that this movie and its talented director do not receive the plaudits they deserve heres hoping that the dvd will do very well and bring both to the attention of wider audience the actors gave excellent performances and the plot is excellent perhaps overall the movie is little long but may miles thomas seems to enjoy her actors when they are giving strong performances and therefore sometimes holds them in longer close ups than necessary good for the actors am sure but sometimes as the audience you are ready to move on so to speak with the plot may miles thomas deserves more recognition from the film business as one of our foremost digital movie directors

had two reasons for watching this swashbuckler when it aired on danish television yesterday first of all wanted to see gina lollobrigida and here wasnt disappointed she looked gorgeous second of all through reading about the film had gotten the impression that it featured absurd humor not unlike that which can be found in philippe de brocas films on this account however was sadly disappointed found the jokes predictable apart from few witty remarks on the topic of war and the characters completely onedimensional also the action scenes were done in strangely mechanical and uninspired fashion with no sense of drama at all kept watching until the end but got bored very quickly and just sat there waiting for the scenes with lollobrigida

this film is an abomination of all that is worthy in film making the lead actor surprises his audience by not actually acting at all we have to watch almost two hours of his bland soulless face the jokes are all lame never laughed once it was saturday night there were of us having beer all up for laugh and then we put this on and you could feel all the warmth and colour being drained from the room the film ended and the mood was ruined so we all went our separate ways ruined the night ok so pros and cons pros beautiful setting in hawaii looks good on bluray cons worst acting ever you can tell everyone concerned is just thinking about payday predictable poor plot zero character development forced jokes which fall flat many shots of the guys penis which to be fair acts better than him and has more charisma may all makers of this film hang their heads in shame and hold their flaccid manhoods cheap

this was my first gaspar noe movie ive watched and have to say was shocked dont mind gore in generally but this isnt even gore its real butchering for some of you couple of scenes may be impossible to see and mean really disgusting leaving aside these aspects the main ideas revealed here and the dialog are quite brilliant when you are given strong argument against bringing new life into the world and the manner in which it is given you cant stop and take minute to think about it the actors did their job well representing general masks of handpick few people found at the bottom of diseased society the movie is full of metaphors but ill let you figure them out dont watch it if you want to have lite relaxing time recommend this movie to all those of you who want something to think about or simply watch something different of what you find in your average cinema

agree with bigalc this movie actually prepared me for lot of the cultural differences and practices before went to live in japan for year in tom selleck does fantastic job here as always and the movie is greatly humorous and educational im big fan of tom sellecks and he blesses this part with his usual charm and charisma to this part bringing the film to life in way cant imagine any other actor being able to pull off this film featured some firstrate japanese actors and it was highly entertaining to watch them as they interacted with selleck can imagine the fun he had during the actual filming of the movie japans an awesome place to go whether you want to party sightsee or just try to take everything in

laughed so hard during this movie my face hurt ben affleck was hilarious and reminded me of pretty boy jack black in this role gandolfini gives his typical performance the entire cast is funny the story pretty good and the comic moments awesome went into this movie not expecting much so perhaps that is why was so surprised to come out of the flick thoroughly pleased and facially exhausted would recommend this movie to anyone who enjoys comedy can identify with loneliness during the holidays andor putting up with the relatives the best part to this film to me anyway were the subtle bits of humor that caught me completely off guard and had me laughing long after the rest of the audience had stopped namely the scene involving the lighting of the christmas tree go see it and have good laugh

although lived in australia in moved overseas not long after fed up with constant industrial unrest the general worship of mediocrity unless one is sportsman and the complacency of so many australians who chose to ignore the breakneck pace of change taking place in countries to their north consequently missed the dismissal along with many other australianmade tv dramas of the 80s and 90s such as the superb janus and phoenix series which have since seen along with wildsideto me the filmed story of the dismissal is fair and as far as am aware accurate however as to public outrage it only shows one side of the picture not how families were riven by the controversy know as my two brothers would not speak to me for months afterward but the commentary is in my view very onesided throughout the inescapable fact is that notwithstanding fiery expressions of rage from substantial proportion of the community the australian electorate chose and chose decisively in favour of fraser as they did again two years later this apart historically accurate and superbly well acted docudrama

the problem is the role of the characters in the film man to man shows british anthropologist kidnapping two pygmies and taking them to scotland and then realising that they are not animals or subhumans but actually equal to himself the problem is the role of the pygmies in the film two people who are kidnapped treated like animals and yet given such shallow stereotypical role within the film the kidnapper british anthropologist ends up being the hero of the film because he manages to relate to the pygmies no notion of how the two hostages feel of their point of view of their ordeal find it is shallow film with one sided fundamentally racist view it never manages to move away from the white mans view

life begins and ends in typical 1930s maternity recovery ward where we view hours in the lives of several high risk pregnant women played by loretta young glenda farrell clara blandick aunty em vivienne osborne dorothy tree and gloria shea as they await to give birth while the film features plot devices which seem far fetched today when maternity wards are much more controlled and restricted it does offer us look back in time to see what giving birth in typical city hospital in was like for our grandmothers and greatgrandmothers found the film fascinating and exceptionally movingoddly enough the most outstanding performance in this film comes from male cast member young eric linden as jed sutton graces loretta young husband what an actor as first time father jed is distraught and uneasy with hospital staff who seem to brush off his concerns about his wife as they might brush crumbs off cafeteria table felt his every concern keenly id like to see more of this actors work he had very emotional voice which was used to unforgettable effect in gone with the wind in that film eric played the young soldier whose leg was amputated without anesthesia who screamed dont cut dont cut as scarlett fled the hospital in horror chilling another great performance is from aline macmahon who plays miss bowers the nurse her character is salt of the earth type the kind of nurse we all hope to get for our hospital stays who breaks the hospital rules constantly in order to show more humane side of the medical professionloretta young did another superb acting job here as well very authentic and deeply felt performance as grace my she is great in these precodes ive really grown to appreciate her more as an actress the last few monthsglenda farrell played her role of shrill unwed mother little over the top for my taste didnt anyone know back in that swigging brandy from hot water bottle might be hazardous to unborn babies health but her character redeems herself in the endalso in the cast was an uncredited gilbert roland silent movie star as grieving italian husband his screen time was brief but notablelife begins is mustsee precode try to catch it sometime on tcm but remember to bring few hankies to cry into out of
this is great film touching and strong the direction is without question breathless good work to the team feel so sorry for marlene by the grace of god go you or

possible spoilers perhaps must say that cinderella ii dreams come true is one of the worst movies ever made first of all the movie was made during the height of disneys sequel rampage it was created around the same time as the little mermaid ii the jungle book ii and peter pan ii all of which were disservices to their original film classics disney also made the hunchback of notre dame ii and atlantis ii but im going to drop that topic because their original movies were never really classics in the first place let me go ahead and say that am an avid supporter of good disney films and absolutely adore the original disney cinderella the sequel to cinderella however was waste of time the character of cinderella in the sequel was so very unlike the original girl that grew up watching in the original cinderella was kind and loving the new cinderella had very outofcharacter moments with currentera phrasing like im going to do this banquet my way let me also tell you that new cinderella as have affectionately named her says ewww that is the anticinderella try to find the best in people but in the sequel anastasia one of the stepsisters is good what the heck why they made it all out to be like lady tremaine and drizella are just horrible family members for poor little anastasia my question to the world did the people at disney watch the original cinderella when making this sequel well it surely doesnt seem so if remember correctly anastasia was just as abusive to cinderella as drizella and lady tremaine am all for redemption and forgiveness but there was no point of redemption for anastasia in this movie in the first one anastasia was evil in the second one she is good one just cant leave story like this hope disney realizes that this movie among other movies is shaming walt disneys name perhaps now that michael eisner is gone things will start shaping up around the house of mouse

hopefully the score has changed by now due to my brilliant and stunning review which persuades all of you to go and watch the film thereby creating an instant chorus of 8s this movies true scoreas mentioned before chris rock is the king previous to going to see this movie wasnt that over the top about him but now im banging on the doors of chris rocks website begging him to take me on as his protege this film is truly funny if you dont find this movie funny you really need therapy and its humour which targets all areas of society including racepredictably class division love wealth employment dreams stand up comedy the list goes onthere was one slight disappointment for me however this was that in going into this film didnt realise that it was actually remake of heaven can wait another quite good movie made in with warren beatty as such was quite surprised when watched this movie and suddenly the plot began to unravel to be distinctly similar to an older movie had watched on tv few weeks ago regardless this movie is in my opinion the better version out of the two of them simply because of the different areas it covers and the fact that chris rock is funnier than warren beatty any second of any day of any week of any year of anyyou get the picturewell to the actual plot of the filmdont spoil the experience for yourself dont read the plot just go and watch movie because there have been two reviews on imdb so far that have raved mad about it go see it because it is the funniest thing you would have seen in long time go and see it because its cinema experience that doesnt leave you grumbling ad nauseum at the cost of cinema tickets go see it because it is good movie

formula movie about the illegitimate son of rich chilenian who stands to inherit fortune and gets mixed up in the affairs of bad guys and falls in love with beautiful female lawyer vargas it looks very much like tv movie not really exciting the only reason bothered to see it was because valentina vargas was in it no real surprises here though it is nice to see vargas great looking chilenian landscapes on display but malcolm mcdowells part is very small and doesnt add much to the movie michael ironside plays as usual bad guy but this is not one of his most memorable parts the chase scenes are standard fare

whatever rating give boom is only because of the superb location photography of sardinia and rome otherwise this is only for hardcore addicts of elizabeth taylor her downward phase and richard burton his miscasting phase tennessee williams wrote the milk train doesnt stop here anymore and is supposed to be very fond of this adaptation of his playbut apparently he was the only one taylor reportedly hated it and burton needed the moneywhatever it amounts to hill of beans with taylor posturing and fuming in her shrill manner exploding at the servants and exchanging bad babytalk with no less than noel coward who seems to be visitor from another film when he finally appearsits so campy that among taylor fans its probably considered must see kind of thing but if you can sit through this one without drink in your hand youre way ahead of me sadly this is the film that signified the end of taylor being taken seriously as film actress even after winning two oscars for burton it was equally disastrous and the critics called it bomb judge for yourself if you dare

viva la bam this jackass spin off focuses on the obviously scripted adventures of bam margera and his pals johnny knoxville brandon dicamillo etc this show while it has its fair share of grossout comedy and crazy stunts focuses mainly on bams torturing of his parentsim sorry to say this bam but youre in no way as cool as you think you are this ego tripped show is not only painfully unfunny and yes liked jackass but also narcissistic beyond belief the overly stylized intro ends with bam coolly explaining that hes going to do whatever the he wants to how about you do something that is actually funny liked jackass for what it was worth the camerawork was horrible any idiot could have made better show with camcorder in their parents garage but at least the show moved at steady pace and never felt boring between the crazy dangerous or simply disgusting stunts the pals performednot so with viva la bam we follow our hero around as he plays pranks on his friends and tortures his relatives but never does it feel like anything else than really lame and scripted comedy the stunts and pranks are mildly entertaining but presented in such tedious and dull fashion that they can barely make you smileviva la bam is poor spinoff of that does little good but feed margeras already too big ego dont recommend this lame and unimaginative show to anyone

had never heard of larry fessenden before but judging by this effort into writing and directing he should keep his day job as journeyman actor like many others on here dont know how to categorize this film it wasnt scary or spooky so cant be called horror the plot was so wafer thin it cant be drama there was no suspense so it cant be thriller its just bad film that you should only see if you were fan of the blair witch project people who liked this film used words like ambiguity and complex and subtle but they were reading into something that wasnt there like the blair witch people got scared because people assumed they should be scared and bought into some guff that it was terrifying this movie actually started off well with the family meeting the locals after hitting deer it looked like being modern day deliverance but then for the next minutes well over half the film nothing happened the family potted about their holiday home which was all very nice and dandy but not the slightest bit entertaining it was obvious the locals would be involved in some way at some stage but essendon clearly has no idea how to build suspense in movie finally when something does happen its not even clear how the father was shot how he dies the nurse said his liver was only grazed and all the time this wendigo spirit apparently tracks down the apparent shooter in very clumsy way with 3rd grade special effects the film is called wendigo but no attempt is made to explain it in any clear way the film ends all muddled and leaves you very unsatisfied would have bailed out with minutes to go but wanted to see if this movie could redeem itself it didnt

schlocky 70s horror filmsya gotta love em in contrast to todays boring slasher flicks these ktel specials actually do something scary and do not resort to tired formulathis is movie about the making of moviethat went horribly wrong faith domergue this island earth stars as an overthehill movie queen making movie about series of grisly murders that befell family in their home her boyfrienddirector who looks and acts like gordon jump with an attitude is filming on location and on tight schedule the ken doll costar discovers book of tibetian chants that they work into the script to add realism unfortunately realism is something they could have done withoutjohn carradine having long since given up looking for the 17th gland the unearthly now eeks out humble existence as the caretaker for the estate he goes about his daily work but always seems to run afoul of the directorthe horror builds slowly dead cat here john carradine entering grave there finally culminating in seven yes seven murders at least theres truth in advertising its just sad that the ghoul didnt understand that there was movie being made above him how was poor faith to know that those darn tibetian chants would actually work face it you just cant go around tugging on satans coat and expect him to take it lying downsterno says perform an autopsy on the house of seven corpses

suppose for this film was supposed to be cool but looking back now years its charm was just as silly as its entertainment value granted the special effects do well on tv with the series that started in but for the big screen once had fish tank that was equally as exciting must agree about the octopus scene near the end where it attached itself to the seaview obviously not well stagedor trained overall its pretty bad acting with shoddy special effects and still do recommend it for fun laughs sake this was probably one of irwin allens biggest films and think he thought lot of it barabara eden went on to play genie on tv micheal ansara was her husband now that is cool part about this film always enjoyed seeing real life husband and wife teams star in the same movie neat

this is one of the finest films to come out of hong kongs new wave that began with tsui harks zu warriors of magic mountain tsui set tone for the new waves approach to the martial arts film that pretty much all the directors of the new wave jackie chan sammo hung wong jing ching siu tung etc accepted from then on as given namely the approach to such films thenceforth would need more than touch of irony if not outright comedy burning paradise put stop to all that and with vengeanceits not that there isnt humor here but it is purely human humor as with the aged buddhist priest at the beginning who somehow manages quick feel of the nubile young prostitute while hiding in bundle of straw but this is just as humans are not even buddhist priests can be saints all the timewhen irony is at last introduced into the film it is the nastiest possible emanating from the abbot of red lotus temple who is study in pure nihilism such as has never been recorded on film before he is the very incarnation of miltons satan from paradise lost better to rule in hell than serve in heaven and if he cant get to satans hell soon enough hell turn the world around him into living hell he can rulethats the motif underscoring the brutal violence of much of the imagery here its not that the abbot just wants to kill people he wants them to despair to feel utterly hopeless to accept his nihilism as allencompassing reality thus theres definite sense pervading the red temple scenes that there just might not be any other reality outside of the temple itself it has become all there is to the universe and the abbot claiming mastery of infinite power is in chargeof course fortunately the film doesnt end there though there are losses the human will to be just ordinarily human at last prevails if you want to know how see the film yet there is no doubt that in viewing this film we visit hell hopefully we do not witness our own afterlives but we certainly feel chastened by the experience and somehow better for it over all

fabulous book about fox and his family who does what foxs do that being stealing from farms and killing prey until trio of farmers decide theyve had enough of this fox and try in various ways to have the problem solved they are of course out foxed at every turn and while the trio are camped out at the fox hole the family perform raids against the three farmers landthefilm version and use the term film very loosely is more of god awful pastiche of american heist movies particularly the oceans movies they they even have george clooney as mr fox to to add to the insult and manage to miss the point of the story quite completely so kudos to them theyll make lots of money and destroy another classic roald dahl children book

as soon as it hits screen it destroys all intelligent life forms around but on behalf of its producers must say it doesnt fall into any known movie category it deserves brand new denomination of its own its neurological drama it saddens and depresses every single neuron inside persons brainits the closest thing one will ever get to stroke without actually suffering one it drives you speechless all you members go numb your mouth falls open and remains so and the most strange symptom of all is that you get yourself wishing to go blind and deafno small feat for such sort of moviethe only word that comes to my mind just having finished my ordeal is outrage

for film made in senegal based guess loosely on carmen the book by prosper merimee this film doesnt achieve mere resemblance of the story that has been made famous as an opera and as other filmsms gai as the karmen of the title is very good to look at her fiery dancing smolders the screen as is the case with her torrid love scene at the beginning of the filmthis is karmen that aims to please to all genders but real carmen she is notwe would like to see ms gai in other films in which her talent is better used than here

this is very noir kind of episode it begins with jim returning from weekend trip with new girlfriend the recently divorced karen mills pat delaneydaughter in law of john huston who knew few things about noir film and her daughter when they arrive karen goes in the house while jim picks up her daughter from the back seat and carries her up to her room he then discovers karen has disappeared without trace of course he calls dennis and when the police arrive they see no sign of karen but find her next door neighbor murdered in the bushes so of course that makes jim an immediate suspectthis is great little mystery and the first half of the story is shown by rocky asking jim to go over the story once again rocky suggests that by jim telling him the story he might remember little detail that he didnt think was important at the time but now might lead to clue as to what happened its really well written scene and completes the transition of the rocky character from grifter to concerned parent it also goes long way to show that rocky isnt just some clueless old man either as he says you come to me because im your father and im smarter than you this is one of those times where we see where jim got his smartsthis episode also features an appearance by hottie lara parker who played angelique in the dark shadows series and went on to play laura banner bruces wife in the incredible hulk series few years later she looks terrific herethis episode also marks the first mention of the minette crime family name that would keep popping up on the rockford files almost whenever they needed mob family this time its vincent minette who rockford helps apprehendlt diehl tom atkins makes his first appearance on the series and dennis is quietly demoted from police lieutenant that he was on the earlier season one episodes to police sargent guess they figured it would be better to have dennis less powerful and add some conflict between jim and the police frankly they were right though prefer the later lt chapman to lt diehl not lot of the typical rockford humor in this episode but good mystery with lot of heart

the royal rumble has traditionally been one of my favourite events and ive been wrestling fan for good few years now the other shows may have better matches but ive always found the actual rumble match to be full of excitementim not going to reveal the winners of any match as dont see it as fair to ruin the results on review will comment on the quality of them thoughwe have the standard matches and then the big rumble event two from smackdown and two from rawshawn michaels and edge open up for raw this proves to be good match from two talented guys this is match id recommend watching its hard to sum up without giving away the winnernext we have the usual undertaker against some big nasty monster be whoever it is giant gonzales yokozuna kamala well this time its heidenreich its also casket match typical undertaker fare watch if youre fan have to admit am purely for the entertainment factor it can hardly be regarded as classic wrestling matchthe next two matches are the title matches for once smackdown manages to upstage raw their title match is pretty thrilling and enjoyable but with anticlimax and let down to end it raws match is pretty dull and boring affair which is pity as im fan of both guys involvednow to the main reason love the event the rumble its pretty good one this year coming up to the event we all had pretty good idea of who might win and it may not prove big surprise but hey its very enjoyable there are the usual diverse ways of people being eliminated there is the token guy who doesnt make it to the ring the entrant who is ridiculous and we all want to see vanquished and someone gets eliminated by previously eliminated combatant it has its usual highs and lows and loved the ending in particular the vince mcmahon entranceid recommend this show not the wwe on top form but its still good add it to your collection

remember this in similar vein to the young ones wed stumble back from the pub and watch this or tape it and then spend weeks replaying the lines to each otherwe called one of our mates zipmole watkins after the brilliant episode in which daniel peacock has bit of restyling on his nose by the back street abortionistlots of great lines remember at in the morning you can only get white bread from brown man take it easy guy gandhi as local shopkeepertony woodcock was definitely on there in the episode they were teaching ralph daniel peacock to be barman its no good amanda ill never make it as bar man helen lederer teaches him to ask people about the match see the match last night thought woodcock played well after string of failed conversations the curly haired arsenal star was sitting at the bar see the match last night yeah thought played wellwe still do odd stupid lines now reg and ralph or ralph and reg reg reg reg reg reg reglots of very surreal silly moments and very surreal songs from the flatlets the back street abortionist personal favourite with the great ending line and hell mark your packages return to sendergood old danny peacock you added lot to some young drinkers evenings sirupdate found couple of episodes on tape im going to upload the gandhi sketch to youtube

destined to be classic before it was even conceptualized this game deserves all the recognition it deserves at time when firstperson shooters like quake iii arena and unreal tournament are garnering all the attention of computer gamers graphic adventures are dying breed with great pun and humour the curse of monkey island is game that people of all age groups would enjoy life can only improve after playing the curse of monkey island prediction the sequel escape from monkey island is already destined to be classic too guarantee it

stephane audran is the eponymous heroine of this beautifully measured study of small danish community towards the end of the last century two beautiful and musically talented sisters giveup their own prospects of happiness and marriage in order to lookafter their ageing father one day french woman babette comes to work for them after some years she wins the lottery and is determined to do something for the sisters who have taken her in her solution is to prepare an exquisite and sumptuous feast which changes the lives of all those invited this is film about human and cultural interaction reflected in the changing language of the dialogue from danish to french and especially between the dutiful sobriety of protestant northern europe and the sensuousness of the catholic south it is also about human needs and how warmth and kindness can be expressed and stimulated through the cultivation of the senses profoundly uplifting film

this movie was way overhyped lot of the viewers who thought this was amazing must have been into the old school movies cause the whole movie is set in the past at first thought the movie was just showing something from the past so was expecting that faded dreamy like lighting on the characters to pass but it just going basically this was movie trying to mix the future with the past and the dont mix very well in this movie even with special effects you could actually see the blue screen the actors were working with there are too many movies out there that do exactly what this movie did so there is no reason for critics to hype this movie up saying its the greatest movie ever done its just crap on stick it also didnt help that the story line was sooo crappy dont understand why hollywood agreed to have this movie produced and also dont understand how actorsactresses in this movie are willing to be in movie like this its almost as though everybody read the script and forgot to read the fine printit will all be done on computer this was movie that should have been on movie network because nothing about this movie was revolutionary im very upset with myself for paying money to see this whatever you do dont waste your time and money on this movie today or tomorrow

dunno sometimesyou try and try and try to be charitable towards all the thru grade movies out there but once in while particular movie just tests your patience until you want to slap everyone involved bat people which saw under the title it lives by night is just such movie you cant watch this without thinking that it really should have been an episode on night gallery and not one of the better ones either the movie has something to do with doctor who gets bitten by bat and consequently starts to morph into werebat who drinks human blood actually youd think if he was turning into real bat hed be eating mosquitoes by the gallon bucket but because this is cheap lurid horror movie bloods the word in spite of the fact that he has grandmal seizures at the drop of hat and blackout episodes almost every night his friend and fellow physician dr mustache aspenextreme insists that hes just having an allergic reaction to the rabies shots meanwhile the worlds most obnoxious and stereotyped county sheriff suspects the doc of being responsible for the brutal murder and exsanguination of several local girls and one wino also meanwhile the doctors wife decides that denial is river in egypt and alternately patronizes him and nags him to distraction its not so much that the acting is bad you can tell that the actors are making professional level choices and are trying to bring some juice and life to the script even the guy who plays the sheriff okay it is pretty bad but its bad in clichéd wooden professional way its just that everything about the acting the way the scenes are paced the costumes the dialog the script and the story line in general sets your teeth on edge and makes you want to well slap everyone involvedi think the movie had an outside chance at being spooky unsettling little cult favorite but1the director needed to beat michael pataki an experienced character actor with chair until pataki agreed to act and not just channel dennis weaver 2he also needed to find script that made little more sense with regard to the whole bat bites human who then turns into bat scenario he also needed the actor who played the doctor to find little more physically believable bit of stage business for his episodes instead of resorting to man has seizure page from the little golden book of clichéd acting mannerisms he needed to rework the whole wife character make her both more intelligent less shrill and waaaaay more observant would never voluntarily watch this film again except with the help of mike and the bots its bad but it isnt bad in silly humorous or interesting way still better than battlefield earth or waterworld though

big fat liar is what you get when you combine terrific writing great production and an emphasis on clever ideas over adolescent pap the two stars work great together andwhat can say amanda bynes shines putting irkel and lee majors in the film were brilliant touches watch this film with your kids if you dont laugh throughout it you must not have been paying attention

tim robbins and john cusack are two actors have appreciated throughout their careers and that was the only reason for choosing to watch this movie well all can say is totally regretted it these two great actors humiliate themselves all the way through by performing number of irrelevant unimaginative and kitch to the extreme not that this is bad on its ownsketches that are supposed to make people laugh but fail to do so the only reason can think is that the director was their friend and they decided to support his movie by starring in iti cant think of anything else because this movie is so cheap fortunately tim robbins and john cusack havent disappointed me ever since would recommend you to avoid this film unless you want your opinion about the two actors spoiled

on watching this film was amazed at how media perception can mould persons opinion of celebrity karen carpenter was carefree but very unconfident young lady whose wonderful voice helped her and her brother richard to soar the charts with wonderful songs as with all celebrities of today they were often criticised about their music as well as their looks styles etc this had huge effect on karen who raged battle against her eating and drastically lost weight which eventually caused her death this heart felt film was not initially something which would have thought of watching but on starting to view it then was hooked in the same way that the tina turner story does then this film enlightens you and allows you to see into the young performers life the acting was superb and even after nearly years after it was made then the directional and the dialogue are still entertainingi would recommend this to anyone who hasnt yet watched it it is amazingly accurate and emotionally charged

nothing is sacred just ask ernie fosselius these days everybody has video camera and movie is hardly out before the spoofs start flying quickly written and shot and often posted directly to the internet spoofs are hot these days and we go out of our way to make sure filmmakers dont get off on their own selfimportance years ago when the first star wars was made it was different world filmmaking was the playground of select few and spoofs were very rare then god gave us hardware wars it was shot to look cheap or was it just cheap and the audio was obviously recorded after the fact does that take away from the experience heck no thats what makes it so great it was raw and unpolished and hit relentlessly on some of the more pretentious moments of the original movie from fluke starbucker waving around flashlight instead of lightsaber did that when was young to chewchilla the wookie monster to auggie ben doggies nah just little headache remark this film short is as much part of the phenomenon as any of the actual star wars films rent it buy it borrow it from friend and may the farce be with you always

usually try to be professional and constructive when criticize movies but my god this was the worst movie have ever seen bad acting bad effects bad script bad everything the plot follows group of teen cliches on their way to rave that takes place in broad daylight at remote island however when the group arrives all they find is an empty dance floor and bloody clothes determined to find out what happened to the rest of the partygoers the clan sets off on mission through zombieinfested forest during this crusade they are aided by police chick and sea captain that just happens to have the right number of weapons to give to each of the kids they also meet up with jonathan cherry and some other survivors basically the rest of the movie is collection of poorly directed action sequences including far too long shootout outside of the house of the dead this fight came complete with cheesy hollywood violence redundant clips from the hotd video game and sloppy matrixesque camera rotations one of the characters even volunteers to sacrifice himself to save the others why not because he was noble and brave but because part of his face got scarred by acid zombie spat on him after he continued to beat the creature long after it had been disabled im supposed to feel sorry for this guyto sum it all up there is absolutely no point in seeing this movie unless you want to see for yourself just how terrible it is the theater was in was more dead than the zombies on the screen and im sure the money wasted seeing this piece of sht could easily cover the costs it took to make it grade

if you like me is going to see this in film history class or something like that at your school try to convince your teacher to see something else believe me anything is better than this movie it is slow paced confusing boring poorly constructed gory gringy do need to go on its message is good but have seen them been handled better in several other films the acting isnt even any good this movie is just even more awkward as it start off as being funny not intensional thoughbecause of its surreal story than at the end just becomes uncomfortable to watchi honestly feel like hour and minutes of my life has been robbed why would anyone want to watch girls describe threesome for minutes than watch them drive through traffic jam for minutes listen to hippie who can make sheep appear witness sort of rape than see the female lead role eat her husbandhonestly this movie deserves nothing but and if your not happy with my previewseriously im an open minded guy and like movies that protest through symbolism but this movie was just awful make any excuse you can to avoid this film
